name: Super Robot Taisen F
summary: Famous franchise of Banpresto, Super Robot Taisen is a mixture of famous Anime and Manga robots in the same universe, creating a lot of impossible situations like using a Gundam to fight against Mazinger and so on! This version is special because you have a lot of Gundam robots specially from Gundam Wing with Duo Maxwell and Heero and the famous Gainax robots from Evangelion.
